item.title: Linpus QuickOS on Acer Aspire One
item.description: Another video from Sascha at the Linpus booth during CeBIT 2009 introducing Linpus QuickOS on an Acer Aspire One.

item.title: Secret Netbook Running Linpus Linux Lite
